# subscribe(_:)

**Instance Method**

Attaches the specified subscriber to this publisher.

## Declaration

```swift
func subscribe<S>(_ subscriber: S) where S : Subscriber, Self.Failure == S.Failure, Self.Output == S.Input
```

## Parameters

- **subscriber**: The subscriber to attach to this publisher. After attaching, the subscriber can start to receive values.

## Discussion

Always call this function instead of [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher/receive(subscriber:)]. Adopters of [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher] must implement [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher/receive(subscriber:)]. The implementation of [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher/subscribe(_:)-4u8kn] provided by [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher] calls through to [doc://com.apple.Combine/documentation/Combine/Publisher/receive(subscriber:)].

## Working with subscribers

- **receive(subscriber:)**: Attaches the specified subscriber to this publisher.
- **subscribe(_:)**: Attaches the specified subject to this publisher.
